extensionDescription.message: 2024 Spotify extension that allows you to set up new themes, fonts, remove annoying notifications, popups, and more!

header_subtitle.message: Setup new themes, fonts and so on!

mi_9.message: Block all images to reduce traffic usage (experimental)

s_subtitle.message: Here are some troubleshooting steps you can try:

s_res__2.message: Disable and then enable again SpoPlus.

s_emailme.message: If the problem still here, please email me at

s_effic.message: To help me assist you more efficiently, please include this information:

s_detail__1.message: The version of SpoPlus you are using.

s_detail__2.message: A screenshot or video demonstrating the problem.

s_detail__3.message: A detailed description of the issue.

s_detail__4.message: Your browser and its version (e.g., Firefox 86.0).
